SELECT s.`sp_shopid`,s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`,s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,sk.`sk_number`,s.`sp_Manufacturer`,s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code` FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid
tp.sp_type_id = #{value}

SELECT s.`sp_shopid`,s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`,s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,sk.`sk_number`,s.`sp_Manufacturer`,s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code` FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid
and s.sp_shopid like concat('%',#{nameandid},'%') or s.sp_name like concat('%',#{nameandid},'%')
